p:
Essential oils produced by various plant species are found to possess a number of biological activities including phytotoxic activity. As a matter of fact, not only essential oils but also their constituent such as thymol, β-myrcene, limonene, camphor, eucalyptol, geraniol, α- and β-pinene, borneol, etc. have been reported to play roles as plant growth regulatory agents
40– 42 .
